item.title: [Python] Tkinter template
item.description: #Introduction We will organize the standard method for classifying Tkinter, a Python GUI tool. This is an introduction article of the procedure to create an Image Viewer using this template. (Addition) Create Image Viewer with Tkinter #Classification template Application class Widget setting & placement, Callback function defined main function import tkinter as tk from tkinter import ttk class Application(tk.Frame): def __init__(self,master): super().__init__(master) self.pack() self.master.geometry("300x300") self.master.title("Tkinter with Class Template") self.
